description:
Due to his father's disappearance, Itsuki Iba has to take over the family business: a magician dispatch service. Their family employs countless magicians and other supernatural beings in order to send them out to help those who need magical assistance. As a leader, Itsuki now has to be tough, commanding, and reliable, but there's one problem, he's a coward. Also, in order to run a successful business, he must connect with his employees, which is more difficult than it seems due to his personality. But not only does he have to deal with his own employees, he also has to deal with those who threaten the family business.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: บริษัทจัดหาเวทย์

[Profile (Pony Canyon)](https://www.ponycanyon.co.jp/artist/31356600) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/black_fukuyama)

Fukuyama released his debut music album "Romantic World 31" on his birthday (November 26) in 2009, his second album "Love Letters 2: Paris Romantic" on July 21, 2010, his third album "Fukuyama Jun, Ai wo Utau!" on May 25, 2011, and his fourth album "Love Letter 3 ~Matsuri no Kuni de~" on May 22, 2013. He also appeared in a 2009 romantic comedy movie Fujoshi Kanojo in a cameo role.

**Non-anime roles:**

__Nicknames:__ いしずか (Ishizuka), 静様 (Shizuka-sama), (静) 御前 ("Shizuka" Gozen)

[Profile (Ken Production)](https://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/8) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/beerlover-shizuka/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shizuka_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤静)

She married on December 5, 2012, her 32nd birthday, but later announced her divorce on April 30, 2020.

She was part of the seiyuu unit with [Hitomi Nabatame](https://anilist.co/staff/95184/) called "Hitomi Nabatame to Shizuka Itou" (生天目仁美と伊藤静) under Geneon's cosmic★motion label. Together they are known by the name Hitoshizuku (ひとしずく).

Won Best Song at the 6th Seiyuu Awards (2012) for "ST☆RISH" (shared with Takuma Terashima, Kenichi Suzumura, Kishou Taniyama, Mamoru Miyano, Hiro Shimono) in _Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love 1000%_. Won Best Supporting Actor at the 7th Seiyuu Awards (2013).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

[Website](http://shonan-beach.com/jun/)

A Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and lyricist. He graduated from Tokyo College of Music.
